Class SessionService2

java.lang.Object
com.example.full_connection.Service.SessionService2
@Service public class SessionService2 extends Object
Service class for managing sessions and related operations. Provides methods for retrieving questions, calculating ZLO ratings, and updating statistics.

    • getQuestion

      public Questions getQuestion(UUID userId)
      Retrieves a question for a specific user based on their statistics.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A question tailored to the user's difficulty level.

    • getStreak

      public int getStreak(UUID userId)
      Retrieves the current streak for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The current streak of the user.

    • zloCalculation

      public float zloCalculation(int streak, float avgTime, float confidence, float sessionScore, int sessionsCompleted)
      Calculates the ZLO rating based on various parameters.
      Parameters:
      streak - The user's current streak.
      avgTime - The average time spent per question.
      confidence - The user's confidence level.
      sessionScore - The score of the current session.
      sessionsCompleted - The total number of sessions completed by the user.
      Returns:
      The calculated ZLO rating.

    • getNextQuestion

      public Questions getNextQuestion(UUID userId, float avgTime, int streak)
      Retrieves the next question for a user based on updated statistics.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      avgTime - The average time spent per question.
      streak - The user's current streak.
      Returns:
      The next question tailored to the user's difficulty level.

    • addNewStatistics

      public UpdateStatisticsDTO addNewStatistics(UUID userId, int streak, int totalQuestions, int totalQuestionsRight, int totalQuestionsWrong, float avgTimeSpentInSession, float successRate, float avgTimePerQuestion, Statistics newStats)
      Adds new statistics for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      streak - The user's current streak.
      totalQuestions - The total number of questions answered.
      totalQuestionsRight - The total number of questions answered correctly.
      totalQuestionsWrong - The total number of questions answered incorrectly.
      avgTimeSpentInSession - The average time spent in a session.
      successRate - The user's success rate.
      avgTimePerQuestion - The average time spent per question.
      newStats - The new statistics to be added.
      Returns:
      A DTO containing the added statistics.

    • updateStatistics

      public UpdateStatisticsDTO updateStatistics(UUID userId, int streak, int totalQuestions, int totalQuestionsRight, int totalQuestionsWrong, float avgTimeSpentInSession, float successRate, float avgTimePerQuestion, Statistics userStats)
      Updates existing statistics for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      streak - The user's current streak.
      totalQuestions - The total number of questions answered.
      totalQuestionsRight - The total number of questions answered correctly.
      totalQuestionsWrong - The total number of questions answered incorrectly.
      avgTimeSpentInSession - The average time spent in a session.
      successRate - The user's success rate.
      avgTimePerQuestion - The average time spent per question.
      userStats - The existing statistics to be updated.
      Returns:
      A DTO containing the updated statistics.

    • submitConfidence

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConfidenceDTO> submitConfidence(UUID userId, float confidence)
      Submits the confidence level for a user and updates their statistics.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      confidence - The confidence level to be submitted.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing the updated confidence and ZLO rating.
